Item.Risk_Statement: Logging facilities and log information is compromised and tampered with due to inadequate data protection mechanisms.
Item.Description: The organization allocates audit record storage capacity in accordance with [Assignment: organization-defined audit record storage requirements].
Item.Example: Data storage space is available to accommodate audit records.
Item.State_Implementation: The state organization allocates sufficient audit record storage capacity and configures auditing to reduce the likelihood of such capacity being exceeded.
Item.Agency_Implementation: Information resource custodians shall ensure sufficient storage space is allocated to maintain audit records for the required duration.
Item.Testing_Procedures:
Obtain audit and accountability policy; procedures addressing audit storage capacity; information system design documentation; organization-defined audit record storage capacity for information system components that store audit records; list of organization-defined auditable events; information system configuration settings and associated documentation; information system audit records; other relevant documents or records and ascertain if
(I)the organization allocates sufficient audit record storage capacity; and
(ii)the organization configures auditing to reduce the likelihood of audit record storage capacity being exceeded.
